channel.title: HTML on Releases - aspose.com
channel.description: Recent content in HTML on Releases - aspose.com

item.title: Download C# Gameware, CAD & 3D Processing DLL | Aspose.3D
item.description: Support Forum Download Aspose.3D to Process 3D Images Open NuGet Package Manager within the Microsoft Visual Studio®, search for Aspose.3D and install. You may also use the following command within the Package Manager Console. For the detailed instructions please visit the Installation documentation page. Release Notes Download PM> Install-Package Aspose.3D   Product Page | Docs | Demos | API Reference | Examples | Blog | Search | Free Support | Temporary License | EULA

item.title: Aspose.Cells | Excel Spreadsheet Processing Java Library
item.description: Java API for Excel File Formats Product Page | Docs | Demos | API Reference | Examples | Blog | Search | Free Support | Temporary License Aspose.Cells for Java is an award-winning Excel Spreadsheet Processing API that allows Java developers to embed the ability to read, write and manipulate Excel® spreadsheets (XLS, XLSX, XLSM, XLSB, XLTX, SpreadsheetML, CSV, ODS), HTML, MHTML, PDF, and image file formats into their own Java applications without needing to rely on Microsoft Excel®.

item.title: Aspose.Email | Java Class Library to Process Outlook Formats
item.description: Java Email API Product Page | Docs | Demos | API Reference | Examples | Blog | Search | Free Support | Temporary License Aspose.Email for Java is a complete set of Email Processing APIs to create, read and manipulate emails from within your applications. It makes it easier to work with many Outlook email message formats such as MSG, EML, EMLX and MHT files without the need of installing Microsoft Outlook.

item.title: Aspose.Diagram | Java Library to Create, Export Visio Docs
item.description: Java API for Microsoft Visio® File Formats Product Page | Docs | Demos | API Reference | Examples | Blog | Search | Free Support | Temporary License Aspose.Diagram for Java API is a solution for Microsoft Visio file manipulation requirements. It allows the Java applications to read, write, export and process Microsoft Visio diagrams while supporting all Visio objects & properties including shapes, pages, images, shape masters, stencils, text, layers, header, footers, user-defined cells, hyperlinks, file protection, geometries, text boxes, and comments.

item.title: Aspose.3D | Java Class Library to Process 3D Images, Models
item.description: Java API for 3D Image Processing Product Page | Docs | Demos | API Reference | Examples | Blog | Search | Free Support | Temporary License Aspose.3D for Java API is built to create, edit, manipulate and save 3D formats. It empowers Java applications to connect with 3D documents without installing any software package on the computer. Aspose.3D for Java API assist developers to model and create massive worlds in games, superb scenes for design visualization, and engage virtual reality experiences.

item.title: Aspose.PDF | Java PDF Document Processing Class Library
item.description: Java API to Process & Manipulate PDF Files Product Page | Docs | Demos | API Reference | Examples | Blog | Search | Free Support | Temporary License Aspose.PDF for Java is a PDF document creation component that enables your Java applications to read, write and manipulate PDF documents without using Adobe Acrobat. aspose.pdf Package Features PDF Document Featres Set basic information (e.g. author, creator) of the PDF document.

item.title: Aspose.Tasks | Java Library to Ceate & Manage Project Tasks
item.description: Microsoft Project File Manipulation API Product Page | Docs | Demos | API Reference | Examples | Blog | Search | Free Support | Temporary License Aspose.Tasks a Java Project Management API to manipulate Microsoft Project files. Developers can define a project’s main and default properties as well as calendar information. API also provides the ability to specify weekdays and calendar exceptions while making it easy to add & recalculate tasks, resources and other data without user intervention.

item.title: Aspose.Slides | Java Library to Process PowerPoint Formats
item.description: Java PowerPoint API Product Page | Docs | Demos | API Reference | Examples | Blog | Search | Free Support | Temporary License Aspose.Slides a Java PowerPoint API for presentation manipulation and management. It allows developers to read, write, convert and manipulate PowerPoint presentations in Java applications with the ability to manipulate all document elements such as slides, tables, text, charts, shapes, images and SmartArt diagrams and more.

item.title: Aspose.Words | Java Library to Process Document Formats
item.description: Java API for Various Document Formats Product Page | Docs | Demos | API Reference | Examples | Blog | Search | Free Support | Temporary License Aspose.Words for Java is an advanced Java Word processing API that enables you to perform a great range of document processing tasks directly within your Java applications. Aspose.Words for Java API supports processing word (DOC, DOCX, OOXML, RTF) HTML, OpenDocument, PDF, EPUB, XPS, SWF and all image formats.

item.title: Aspose.3D for Python via .NET
item.description: Support Forum Download Aspose.3D Python Library for Gameware and CAD Please use the following pip command: Release Notes Download > pip install aspose-3d   Product Page | Docs | Demos | Blog | Code Samples | Free Support | Temporary License | EULA 3D Scene Features Create, read, save, import or export a 3D scene. Define metadata for the 3D scene to add asset information.

item.title: Download Outlook® Objects Processing C++ DLL | Aspose.Email
item.description: Support Forum Download C++ Library to work with Emails Open NuGet Package Manager within the Microsoft Visual Studio®, search for Aspose.Email.Cpp and install. You may also use the following command within the Package Manager Console. For the detailed instructions please visit the Installation documentation page. Release Notes Download PM> Install-Package Aspose.Email.Cpp   Product Page | Docs | Demos | API Reference | Examples | Blog | Search | Free Support | Temporary License | EULA

item.title: Python Email Library | Aspose.Email for Python via .NET
item.description: Support Forum Download Aspose.Email Python Programming Component Please use the following pip command: Release Notes Download > pip install Aspose.Email-for-Python-via-NET   Product Page | Docs | Demos | API Reference | Examples | Blog | Search | Free Support | Temporary License | EULA General Email Features Create emails containing plain text as well as HTML. Create alternative message bodies.

item.title: Exporter for PowerPoint | Aspose.Slides for JasperReports
item.description: Support Forum Download Aspose.Slides to Export JasperReports® to Presentation Formats Aspose.Slides for JasperReports is a lightweight extension that helps you export reports from JasperReports® and JasperServer® to Microsoft PowerPoint® and other supported file formats. Release Notes Download Product Page | Docs | API Reference | Blog | Search | Free Support | Temporary License | EULA Presentation JasperReports® Integration Features Export reports to PPT, PPTX, HTML, and PDF formats.

item.title: Aspose.Cells for Python via .NET
item.description: Support Forum Download Aspose.Cells Python Library for Spreadsheet Processing Aspose.Cells for Python via .NET is a scalable and feature-rich API to process Excel® spreadsheets using Python. API offers Excel® file creation, manipulation, conversion and rendering. Developers can format worksheets, rows, columns or cells to the most granular level, create manipulate chart and pivot tables, render worksheets, charts and specific data ranges to PDF or images, add calculate Excel®'s built-in and custom formulas and much more - all without any dependency on Microsoft Office or Excel® application.

item.title: Aspose.Diagram for Python via .Net
item.description: Support Forum Download Aspose.Diagram Python Library for Visio Processing Aspose.Diagram for Python via .NET is a scalable and feature-rich API to process visio files using Python. API offers Visio file creation, manipulation, conversion, rendering. Developers can format pages to the most granular level, create and manipulate shape, render pages, shapes to PDF and images, and much more - all without any dependency on Microsoft Office or Visio application.

item.description: Aspose.HTML for .NET 23.9 (DLLs only) Download  Support Forum  File Details Downloads: 1 File Size: 4.04MB Date Added: 5/9/2023 Release Noteshttps://releases.aspose.com/html/net/release-notes/2023/aspose-html-for-net-23-9-release-notes/ Descriptionhis ZIP file contains only the Aspose.HTML for .NET assemblies. The assemblies are the same as in the MSI installer of the product of the same version. Download this if you want to use Aspose.HTML without the MSI installer, i.

item.title: Test Web Content Accessibility (WCAG 2) via .NET C# HTML API
item.description: Aspose.HTML for .NET 23.9 Download  Support Forum  File Details Downloads: 1 File Size: 4.56MB Date Added: 5/9/2023 Release Noteshttps://releases.aspose.com/html/net/release-notes/2023/aspose-html-for-net-23-9-release-notes/ DescriptionIt contains Aspose.HTML for .NET 23.9 release. File Details WCAG 2 Testing Support The new Aspose.Html.Accessibility namespace provides a comprehensive API for testing WCAG 2 (Web Content Accessibility Guidelines) requirements. Accurate NOSCRIPT Tag Treatment Aspose.HTML now more accurately interprets the NOSCRIPT HTML tag, which can be used to provide alternative content for users who do not have JavaScript enabled.

item.title: HTML Processing with Reduced Memory Usage | C# .NET Apps API
item.description: Aspose.HTML for .NET 23.10 Download  Support Forum  File Details Downloads: 1 File Size: 4.8MB Date Added: 6/10/2023 Release Noteshttps://releases.aspose.com/html/net/release-notes/2023/aspose-html-for-net-23-10-release-notes/ DescriptionIt contains Aspose.HTML for .NET 23.10 release. File Details Notable Performance Enhancements Aspose.HTML for .NET 23.10 release of the HTML API, offers faster and more efficient functionality, thanks to the following improvements: Better attribute storage and utilization Increaseed HTML parsing speed Optimized data structures Reduced memory usage Fewer redundant object creations Accessibility Improvements The AccessibilityRules class has been updated with a new GetRule(string ruleName) method to make it easier to retrieve specific accessibility rules.
